import {React, useState} from 'react' import { Row,Col,Card,Modal,Image,Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Post({ post }) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); //mostra il MODALE return (
{post.name}

by: {post.username}

{ post.image2 ? ( {post.image3 && } ):( )}

{post.description}

 {post.category === 'works' && See More... }
) } export default Post
